# identifier

**Instance Property**

The string identifier of the task.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier is the same as the one used to register the launch handler in [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGTaskScheduler/register(forTaskWithIdentifier:using:launchHandler:)].
title: identifier
